alert.note: Alert for Conway; Pope; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:57PM CDT until June 25 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Conway County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Yell County in central Arkansas... Central Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 657 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dover, or 11 miles north of Russellville, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville... Atkins... Pottsville... Dover... Hector... Happy Bend... Broomfield... Hattieville... Lanty... Jerusalem... St. Vincent... Blick... Taral... Petit Jean State Park... Lake Dardanelle... Appleton... Ada... Blackwell... Pleasant Valley in Pope County... Economy... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
